page.title: 17POPULATION
page.content:
Long_standing farming families plus a lot of retired people. There are, of course, some younger people and Manaccan School has 31 children, a Head and 2.1 teachers. {Population Figures} Manaccan approx. 300 St.Anthony approx.185 There are 51 houses in Manaccan village itself with 100 _ 120 people. There are approximately 68 houses at Helford.
The number of marriages at Manaccan and St.Anthony average 6 per year. The number of funerals averages 10 at Manaccan and 3 at St. Anthony per year.
